label: Malipatil, Mali B.  2017. Indopamphantus makutaensis, a new genus and species, and Indopamphantini,  a new tribe of Pamphantinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Geocoridae),  as the first representative of the subfamily from the Oriental Region . Zootaxa 4242(2): 281–298.
value: Malipatil, Mali B.  2017. Indopamphantus makutaensis, a new genus and species, and Indopamphantini,  a new tribe of Pamphantinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Geocoridae),  as the first representative of the subfamily from the Oriental Region . Zootaxa 4242(2): 281–298.
title: Indopamphantus makutaensis, a new genus and species, and Indopamphantini, a new tribe of Pamphantinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Geocoridae), as the first representative of the subfamily from the Oriental Region
